options.text: reason: get the hell out of here!
Yes, I guess I would prefere...

text.speaker: GURU
text.text: Quit, quit! Did you here the sound of invading images? It's the walls my son. They are whispering lies! Be aware!

text.speaker: REASON
text.text: Whoever is talking about lies coming out of walls... I know you're drunk my friend. But surly you could not possibly be believing in this...

text.speaker: GURU
text.text: Aaaah, you seeeee my friend. I can hear insiiide you. I know, that there is a voice speaking in youuuur head, telling you, how annoooyiiing, unreeeaaasonable, yeeeees, possibly even dangerous I am. But yeees, yeees.

text.speaker: indent
text.text: But how then can it be, that I know things like this? Even if its un-reason, bad reason, letting me known? Yeees. I think I can see it in your I know, you want to know too? Am I right?

text.speaker: REASON
text.text: That was the right choice my friend!

text.speaker: story
text.text: Without a further ado, you hastily turn a round and run (as far as the darkness and your drunken state allows it) towards the light at the end of the tunnel and back to the toilette.

text.speaker: indent
text.text: You stumble out of the hole, cutting yourself on a sharp piece of glass. You stumble onward towards the door, still hearing the voice of the guru-like man/woman echoing trough the tunnel behind the hole. But then, just as you think yourself freed from this man, this darkness and this emptiness, you find the door looked.

text.speaker: LUCY
text.text: I'm disappointed in you! How could you drink my booze! One thing is for sure, you are a week ugly drunk, this door is nether gonna open for you ever again!

text.speaker: CONSPIRACY
text.text: See? The Guru was right, there are voices in the walls, and there are enemies. Every one is against you.
